headline: Cerence AI Collaborates with DSP Concepts to Revolutionize In-Car Audio
summary: SUMMARY AND KEY POINTS: Cerence’s Audio AI suite is now integrated into Audio Weaver, created by DSP Concepts.Cerence AI’s full Audio AI suite, including Speech Signal Enhancement, Emergency Vehicle Detection (EVD) and In-Car Communication (ICC), is now available through Audio Weaver.Several leading automakers are already using the integrated solution to improve the in-cabin experience.
